vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
HomeyJar.GetHoneyFromJar (patch_4.sol#8-13) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (patch_4.sol#11)
